keyFacts: The document is a financial statement for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for February 2015.
The beginning balance of the account was $510,399.94 with no activity during the month.
Service charges of $50.00 were incurred during the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
There are no overdraft fees or NSF return item fees reported for this statement period.
